prompts: Create a powerful fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and dark fur.
I want a Pokemon that combines the strength of a bear with the agility of a martial artist.
Generate a creature that embodies both resilience and ferocity, ideal for battle scenarios.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique fighting style, inspired by traditional martial arts.
Imagine a dark-colored Pokemon with striking yellow accents and a confident stance.
Design a Pokemon that stands out in a forest environment with its robust form.
Show me a legendary fighter Pokemon that dominates in both strength and strategy.
